>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] JBOOTS: I Need Them Bad....

>
>They spawn in OOT *and* SRO, I have a friend that got them through the
>quest, the ancient cyc was lvl 32 when he found it. The little halfling
>bastard that gives the quest runs around SOW speed, so when you're carrying
>all that gold it's a real pain unless you have a fast friend to hail him
>and
>slow him down so you can catch up.
>
>
> > From: "Dark" <dark@...>
> >
> > Nah ring of the ancients comes off a ancient cyclops. I know for a fact
>they
> > spawn in SRO so that's your best bet. I believe they are the same level
>as
> > giants.
> >
> > Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 44th level
